hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select "AC_TYP" AS "acType", "NAME" AS "acName" from "M_ACCOUNT_TYPE" where "AC_TYP" in (1,2) AND "DEL_FLG" = 0

select "USER_ID" AS "userId", "AC_TYP" AS "acType", "EMAIL" AS "email", "MOBILE" AS "mobile", "FIRST_NAME" AS "firstName", "LAST_NAME" AS "lastName" from "M_USER" where "USER_ID" = :userId AND "PASSWORD" = :password AND "AC_TYP" = CAST (:acType AS INTEGER) AND "DEL_FLG" = 0

INSERT INTO "T_LOGIN_HIST" ( "USER_ID", "AC_TYP", "TYPE", "OTHER", "MAC_ADDRESS", "INS_DT", "INS_BY" ) VALUES( :userId, CAST (:acType AS INTEGER), 'LOGIN', :otherInfo, :macAddress, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, :serviceCode )

INSERT INTO "T_LOGIN_HIST" ( "USER_ID", "AC_TYP", "TYPE", "OTHER", "MAC_ADDRESS", "INS_DT", "INS_BY" ) VALUES( :userId, CAST (:acType AS INTEGER), 'LOGOUT', :otherInfo, :macAddress, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, :serviceCode )
SELECT "USER_ID" AS "userId", "AC_TYP" AS "acType", "EMAIL" AS "email", "MOBILE" AS "mobile", "FIRST_NAME" AS "firstName", "LAST_NAME" AS "lastName" FROM "M_USER" WHERE "DEL_FLG" = 0

INSERT INTO "T_POLICY_STATUS"( "USER_ID", "TYPE", "POLICY_ID", "INS_DT", "INS_BY" ) VALUES ( :userId, :privacyPolicy, (SELECT "ID" FROM "M_POLICY" WHERE "DEL_FLG" = 0 ORDER BY "INS_DT" DESC LIMIT 1), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, :serviceCode );
UPDATE "M_USER" SET "PASSWORD" = :passwordNew, "UPD_DT" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "UPD_BY" = :serviceCode WHERE "USER_ID" = :userId AND "AC_TYP" = CAST (:acType AS INTEGER) AND "DEL_FLG" = 0
SELECT count(*) as "count" FROM "T_USER_PASSWORD_HIST" WHERE "USER_ID" = :userId AND "AC_TYP" = :acType AND "PASSWORD" = :passwordNew
